c4-s6.ipa: pit sèn dɑk pịéː ʨɨ̀ː dɑ̌j siéw .
c4-s6.tupa: pit sen dak pyeq tjy dajh siewq

c4-s8.ipa: pit sèn kʷɑ̀n ʨʉóː ʨɨ̀ː hɨ́ː ʔǒː .
c4-s8.tupa: pit sen kwan tjuoq tjy hyq qoh

c4-s9.ipa: ʦʰiéː gị̀m ɕʉǔː ʨɨ̀ː kʷet ꭧʰẹk jiáː .
c4-s9.tupa: tshieq gyim sjuh tjy kwet tshreek jiaeq

c4-s14.ipa: pʰit pʉòː ʨɨ̀ː kʷet ꭧʰẹk jiáː .
c4-s14.tupa: phit puo tjy kwet tshreek jiaeq

c4-s17.ipa: kʰịàŋ sɨɑ̌ŋ ʨɨ̀ː kʷet ꭧʰẹk jiáː .
c4-s17.tupa: khyaeng syangh tjy kwet tshreek jiaeq

c4-s18.ipa: gɨ̀ː ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː ʈiěː ʔɨə̀ː hɨɑ̌ŋ ʨiáː .
c4-s18.tupa: gy sryoq jyq trieh qyo hyangh tjiaeq

c4-s19.ipa: jʷìː kʷet ꭧʰẹk ɦʉúː nɑ̀n jiěː ʨɨ̀ː pịet ɲɨ́ː .
c4-s19.tupa: jwi kwet tshreek uq nan jieh tjy pyet njyq

c4-s20.ipa: kǒː ɖiàŋ ɕɨk ʨɨ̀ː nə̀ŋ ʔɨə̀ː kʷet ꭧʰẹk ʨiáː .
c4-s20.tupa: koh driaeng sjyk tjy neong qyo kwet tshreek tjiaeq

c4-s24.ipa: gɨ̀ː kʷet bǒː ꭦʉǔː ɦʉúː sɑ̀m .
c4-s24.tupa: gy kwet boh dzruh uq sam

c4-s28.ipa: kị̀m jɨ́ː mạ́ː tʰɑ̌j ɦạ̌w ʔɨ̌ŋ ɦỵèː liěj .
c4-s28.tupa: kyim jyq maeq thajh ghaewh qyngh ue liejh

c4-s39.ipa: ɲɨɑk ʈɨə́ː dɑ̌j ʔɨə̀ː ŋóː ʥip ʨiáː .
c4-s39.tupa: njyak tryoq dajh qyo ngoq djip tjiaeq

c4-s53.ipa: kạ̀ː ʈɨə́ː jɨ́ː ʔit ɦʉ̀n ɦʉ̀n ʨiáː .
c4-s53.tupa: kae tryoq jyq qit un un tjiaeq

c4-s55.ipa: píː ʨɨ̀ː tək gɨ̀ː ʨìn ʨiáː .
c4-s55.tupa: piq tjy teok gy tjin tjiaeq

c4-s56.ipa: pit ɦỵèː ɲɨɑk ɦʉ̀n ɦʉ̀n ʨɨ̀ː ʦʰǐː kʉǒː .
c4-s56.tupa: pit ue njyak un un tjy tshih kuoh

c4-s57.ipa: pit pʉùː ɦỵèː ɲɨɑk pʉ̀j ʨɨ̀ː ʦʰǐː kʉǒː .
c4-s57.tupa: pit pu ue njyak puj tjy tshih kuoh

c4-s60.source: 今以四十九不大於五十。
c4-s60.ipa: kị̀m jɨ́ː sǐː ʥip kʉúː pʉùː dɑ̌j ʔɨə̀ː ŋóː ʥip .
c4-s60.tupa: kyim jyq sih djip kuq pu dajh qyo ngoq djip

c4-s61.ipa: zʷǐː ɦạ̀ŋ ɲɨɑk pʉ̀j ʨɨ̀ː ʦʰǐː kʉǒː .
c4-s61.tupa: zwih ghaeng njyak puj tjy tshih kuoh

c4-s70.ipa: ʑǐː ʔit kʉǒː ʨɨ̀ː ʨʉùŋ ʨɨ́ː jiáː .
c4-s70.tupa: zjih qit kuoh tjy tjung tjyq jiaeq

c4-s71.source: 蓋編程之理或有極繁者。
c4-s71.ipa: kɑ̌j pèn ɖiàŋ ʨɨ̀ː lɨ́ː ɦʷək ɦʉúː gɨk bʉòn ʨiáː .
c4-s71.tupa: kajh pen driaeng tjy lyq ghweok uq gyk buon tjiaeq

c4-s75.ipa: jʉǒŋ ɦʉ̀n ɦʉ̀n ɲǐː ʣɨ̌ː jiak kʰɑ́ː .
c4-s75.tupa: juongh un un njih dzyh jiaek khaq

c4-s77.ipa: ɦʷək sʷìː pʉ̀j jiak ʔɨə̀ː ŋɑ́ː mʉòː jɨə́ː ʨiáː .
c4-s77.tupa: ghweok swi puj jiaek qyo ngaq muo jyoq tjiaeq

c4-s82.ipa: liěj ɦʉot kị̀m ɦʉúː ʥip túː ʨɨ̀ː kʰị̌ː .
c4-s82.tupa: liejh uot kyim uq djip touq tjy khyih

c4-s83.ipa: ʨʉóː ɲìn ɦʉúː ʦʉúː ɲɨɑk kɑ̀n .
c4-s83.tupa: tjuoq njin uq tsuq njyak kan

c4-s85.ipa: ʥip túː jɨ́ː ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ʨiáː kẹ̀j mɑ́n jiàŋ .
c4-s85.tupa: djip touq jyq djyangh tjiaeq keej manq jiaeng

c4-s86.ipa: mʉ̌n kʰị̌ː ɦʉúː ʦʉúː kịǎŋ kɨ́j ɦɑ̀ː .
c4-s86.tupa: munh khyih uq tsuq kyaengh kyjq gha

c4-s93.ipa: ɲɨɑk ʦʉúː lɨɑ̌ŋ dɑ̌j ʔɨə̀ː kʰị̌ː lɨɑ̌ŋ ʨiáː .
c4-s93.tupa: njyak tsuq lyangh dajh qyo khyih lyangh tjiaeq

c4-s99.ipa: píː ʂʉǒː ʨɨ̀ː pʉop ɦʉúː lʉuk .
c4-s99.tupa: piq sruoh tjy puop uq luk

c4-s106.ipa: píː tʰɑ̀ː mʉt ʨɨ̀ː pʉop ɦʉúː ɲǐː .
c4-s106.tupa: piq tha mut tjy puop uq njih

c4-s111.ipa: pʉ̀j ʔit ꭧʰẹk nə̀ŋ děŋ ʨiáː .
c4-s111.tupa: puj qit tshreek neong dengh tjiaeq

c4-s123.ipa: kʉot ɦạ̀ŋ ʦʷɑ̌j mɑt ɲɨɑk pʉ̀j ʨɨ̀ː kʉǒː .
c4-s123.tupa: kuot ghaeng tswajh mat njyak puj tjy kuoh

c4-s124.ipa: lɑ́w ʥiéː ɦʉúː tʰèn dǐː pʉùː ɲìn .
c4-s124.tupa: lawq djieq uq then dih pu njin

c4-s125.ipa: jɨ́ː mʉǒn mʉt ɦỵèː ꭧʰʉòː kúː ʨɨ̀ː kʉǒː .
c4-s125.tupa: jyq muonh mut ue tshruo kouq tjy kuoh

c4-s126.ipa: kị̀m jɨ́ː ɦʷək ɲɨɑk ŋɨ́ː tʰèn ꭧʰẹk ɲɨə̀ː ʥiéː .
c4-s126.tupa: kyim jyq ghweok njyak ngyq then tshreek njyo djieq

c4-s129.ipa: ɲɨɑk mʉt tə́ŋ ʔɨə̀ː gị̀m ɕʉǔː ʨiáː .
c4-s129.tupa: njyak mut teongq qyo gyim sjuh tjiaeq

c4-s133.ipa: ɦʷək ɲɨɑk mʉt tə́ŋ ʔɨə̀ː ʦʰɑ́w muk ʨiáː .
c4-s133.tupa: ghweok njyak mut teongq qyo tshawq mouk tjiaeq

c4-s135.ipa: ɦʉot ɲiéː jiak ꭧʰʉòː kúː jiáː .
c4-s135.tupa: uot njieq jiaek tshruo kouq jiaeq

c4-s137.ipa: ɦʷək ɲɨɑk mʉt tə́ŋ ʔɨə̀ː ɲìn ʨiáː .
c4-s137.tupa: ghweok njyak mut teongq qyo njin tjiaeq

c4-s139.source: 曰『爾雖人。於我實芻狗也。』
c4-s139.ipa: ɦʉot ɲiéː sʷìː ɲìn . ʔɨə̀ː ŋɑ́ː ʑit ꭧʰʉòː kúː jiáː .
c4-s139.tupa: uot njieq swi njin qyo ngaq zjit tshruo kouq jiaeq

c4-s141.ipa: ɦʷək ɲɨɑk mʉt tə́ŋ ʔɨə̀ː ꭧʰʉòː kúː ʨiáː .
c4-s141.tupa: ghweok njyak mut teongq qyo tshruo kouq tjiaeq

c4-s147.source: 曰『吾不知爾何物。然爾之為芻狗明也。』
c4-s147.ipa: ɦʉot ŋòː pʉùː ʈièː ɲiéː ɦɑ̀ː mʉt . ɲièn ɲiéː ʨɨ̀ː ɦỵèː ꭧʰʉòː kúː mịàŋ jiáː .
c4-s147.tupa: uot ngo pu trie njieq gha mut njien njieq tjy ue tshruo kouq myaeng jiaeq

c4-s157.ipa: kěn ʔɨə̀ː pịěn ʂʉǒː ʨɨ̀ː ʨɨɑ̀ŋ .
c4-s157.tupa: kenh qyo pyenh sruoh tjy tjyang

c4-s165.ipa: ɦʉot jɨɑ̀ŋ ʨiáː . syěj ʨɨ̀ː ʨʉóː jiáː .
c4-s165.tupa: uot jyang tjiaeq swiejh tjy tjuoq jiaeq

c4-s169.ipa: ɦʉot ʔị̀m ʨiáː . jɨɑ̀ŋ ʨɨ̀ː ꭦɨə̌ː jiáː .
c4-s169.tupa: uot qyim tjiaeq jyang tjy dzryoh jiaeq

c4-s176.ipa: gɨ̀ː ɲit jʉǒŋ ʨiáː ɦʉúː sɑ̀m .
c4-s176.tupa: gy njit juongh tjiaeq uq sam

c4-s180.ipa: ɲǐː ɦạ̀w kẹ̀j jɨɑ̀ŋ ɦʉ̌j ʨɨ̀ː jɨə́ː .
c4-s180.tupa: njih ghaew keej jyang ujh tjy jyoq

c4-s181.ipa: ɲǐː ɦạ̀w ɦʉúː jɨɑ̀ŋ ɦʉ̌j ʨɨ̀ː ɦʷək .
c4-s181.tupa: njih ghaew uq jyang ujh tjy ghweok

c4-s182.ipa: ʔị̀m ʨiáː jɨɑ̀ŋ jɨɑ̀ŋ ʨiáː ʔị̀m ɦʉ̌j ʨɨ̀ː pʉ̀j .
c4-s182.tupa: qyim tjiaeq jyang jyang tjiaeq qyim ujh tjy puj

c4-s184.ipa: bʉòː kạp ʔịt ʈʉùŋ mʉòː ʔị̀m ɦòː .
c4-s184.tupa: buo kaep qyit trung muo qyim gho

c4-s186.ipa: pʉòː kạp ʔịt ʈʉùŋ ɦʉúː jɨɑ̀ŋ ɦòː .
c4-s186.tupa: puo kaep qyit trung uq jyang gho

c4-s193.ipa: kẹ̀j tək ʨɨə̀ː hɨɑ̌ŋ sɑ̀m ʨiáː .
c4-s193.tupa: keej teok tjyo hyangh sam tjiaeq

c4-s200.source: 而六者亦皆可得諸與非。
c4-s200.ipa: ɲɨ̀ː lʉuk ʨiáː jiak kẹ̀j kʰɑ́ː tək ʨɨə̀ː jɨə́ː pʉ̀j .
c4-s200.tupa: njy luk tjiaeq jiaek keej khaq teok tjyo jyoq puj

c4-s203.ipa: ɦʉǔː ɦʉúː ɲɨɑk gɨ̀ː ɲièn ʨiáː .
c4-s203.tupa: uh uq njyak gy njien tjiaeq

c4-s207.ipa: bʉòː kạp ʔịt ʈʉùŋ mʉòː ʔị̀m ɦòː .
c4-s207.tupa: buo kaep qyit trung muo qyim gho

c4-s211.ipa: ɦʉot kóː ʨɨ̀ː ɲìn ʥiàŋ pʉùː ŋɑ́ː kʰɨ̀ː .
c4-s211.tupa: uot koq tjy njin djiaeng pu ngaq khy

c4-s213.ipa: bʉòː kạp ʔịt ʈʉùŋ mʉòː ʔị̀m ɦòː .
c4-s213.tupa: buo kaep qyit trung muo qyim gho

c4-s216.ipa: ɦʉot kóː ʨɨ̀ː ɲìn ʥiàŋ pʉùː ŋɑ́ː kʰɨ̀ː .
c4-s216.tupa: uot koq tjy njin djiaeng pu ngaq khy

c4-s219.ipa: bʉòː kạp ʔịt ʈʉùŋ ɦʉúː jɨɑ̀ŋ ɦòː .
c4-s219.tupa: buo kaep qyit trung uq jyang gho

c4-s225.ipa: ɦʉot kóː ʨɨ̀ː ɲìn ʥiàŋ pʉùː ŋɑ́ː kʰɨ̀ː .
c4-s225.tupa: uot koq tjy njin djiaeng pu ngaq khy

c4-s227.ipa: bʉòː kạp ʔịt ʈʉùŋ ɦʉúː jɨɑ̀ŋ ɦòː .
c4-s227.tupa: buo kaep qyit trung uq jyang gho

c4-s230.ipa: ɦʉot kóː ʨɨ̀ː ɲìn ʥiàŋ pʉùː ŋɑ́ː kʰɨ̀ː .
c4-s230.tupa: uot koq tjy njin djiaeng pu ngaq khy

c4-s257.source: 曰『賢哉。回也。人不堪其憂。回也不改其樂。』
c4-s257.ipa: ɦʉot ɦèn ʦə̀j . ɦòj jiáː . ɲìn pʉùː kʰə̀m gɨ̀ː ʔʉùː . ɦòj jiáː pʉùː kə́j gɨ̀ː lɑk .
c4-s257.tupa: uot ghen tseoj ghoj jiaeq njin pu kheom gy qu ghoj jiaeq pu keojq gy lak

c4-s261.source: 曰『孝哉。閔子騫。人不間於其父母昆弟之間。』
c4-s261.ipa: ɦʉot hạ̌w ʦə̀j . mị́n ʦɨ́ː kʰịèn . ɲìn pʉùː kẹ̌n ʔɨə̀ː gɨ̀ː bʉóː múː kòn déj ʨɨ̀ː kẹ̀n .
c4-s261.tupa: uot haewh tseoj myinq tsyq khyen njin pu keenh qyo gy buoq mouq kon dejq tjy keen

c4-s267.source: 曰『亡之。命也夫。斯人也。而有斯疾也。』
c4-s267.ipa: ɦʉot mʉɑ̀ŋ ʨɨ̀ː . mịǎŋ jiáː bʉòː . sièː ɲìn jiáː . ɲɨ̀ː ɦʉúː sièː ʣit jiáː .
c4-s267.tupa: uot muang tjy myaengh jiaeq buo sie njin jiaeq njy uq sie dzit jiaeq

c4-s271.ipa: ɦʉot ʔʉòŋ jiáː . kʰɑ́ː ʂɨ́ː nə̀m miěn .
c4-s271.tupa: uot quong jiaeq khaq sryq neom mienh

c4-s280.ipa: ɦʉot ɲɨɑk jʉùː jiáː . pʉùː tək gɨ̀ː síː ɲièn .
c4-s280.tupa: uot njyak ju jiaeq pu teok gy siq njien

c4-s284.ipa: ɦʉot gʉùː . mʉòː nə́j ɲiéː ʥiéː kʷɑ̌ː jɨə́ː .
c4-s284.tupa: uot gu muo neojq njieq djieq kwah jyoq

c4-s288.source: 曰『朽木不可雕也。糞土之牆不可杇也。於予與何誅。』
c4-s288.ipa: ɦʉot hʉúː muk pʉùː kʰɑ́ː tèw jiáː . pʉ̌n tʰóː ʨɨ̀ː ʣɨɑ̀ŋ pʉùː kʰɑ́ː ʔòː jiáː . ʔɨə̀ː jɨə̀ː jɨə́ː ɦɑ̀ː ʈʉòː .
c4-s288.tupa: uot huq mouk pu khaq tew jiaeq punh thoq tjy dzyang pu khaq qo jiaeq qyo jyo jyoq gha truo

c4-s295.source: 曰『賜也。始可與言詩已矣。告諸往而知來者。』
c4-s295.ipa: ɦʉot siěː jiáː . ɕɨ́ː kʰɑ́ː jɨə́ː ŋɨə̀n ɕɨ̀ː jɨ́ː ɦɨ́ː . kɑ̌w ʨɨə̀ː ɦʉɑ́ŋ ɲɨ̀ː ʈièː lə̀j ʨiáː .
c4-s295.tupa: uot sieh jiaeq sjyq khaq jyoq ngyon sjy jyq yq kawh tjyo uangq njy trie leoj tjiaeq

c4-s301.source: 曰『起予者。商也。始可與言詩已矣。』
c4-s301.ipa: ɦʉot kʰɨ́ː jɨə́ː ʨiáː . ɕɨɑ̀ŋ jiáː . ɕɨ́ː kʰɑ́ː jɨə́ː ŋɨə̀n ɕɨ̀ː jɨ́ː ɦɨ́ː .
c4-s301.tupa: uot khyq jyoq tjiaeq sjyang jiaeq sjyq khaq jyoq ngyon sjy jyq yq

c4-s305.ipa: ɦʉot ɲǐː sɑ̀m ʦɨ́ː . ʔɨə́n ʨɨ̀ː ŋɨə̀n ʥiéː jiáː .
c4-s305.tupa: uot njih sam tsyq qyonq tjy ngyon djieq jiaeq

c4-s325.ipa: miàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦʉot lóː ɲìn jiàː .
c4-s325.tupa: miaeng tjy uot loq njin jiae

c4-s337.ipa: zɨ́ː ʦʰiéː kʷet ꭧʰẹk lièn ɦʷạ̀n sɨɑ̀ŋ kʰạ̀m ʨiáː .
c4-s337.tupa: zyq tshieq kwet tshreek lien ghwaen syang khaem tjiaeq

c4-s338.ipa: ɦʷək ʦʰʉóː gɨ̀ː ɦèŋ ɦʉ̌j ʨɨ̀ː kʷet ꭧʰẹk ʥʉǒː .
c4-s338.tupa: ghweok tshuoq gy gheng ujh tjy kwet tshreek djuoh

c4-s339.ipa: pèn ɖiàŋ kʷet ꭧʰẹk ʨɨ̀ː dɑ́w .
c4-s339.tupa: pen driaeng kwet tshreek tjy dawq
